description: The file /home/aerys/Desktop/test/pwn has the cap_setuid capability and is writable allowing an attacker to modify the file and execute it with elevated privileges
The pkexec binary is setuid root and is known to be exploitable in certain versions for privilege escalation allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary commands as root
The snap-confine binary is setuid root and is known to be exploitable for local privilege escalation in certain versions of Ubuntu allowing an attacker to gain root access
